title: Understanding Entropy in Separation Processes
text: Consider if the separation of a mixture into pure substances increases or decreases order in the system. How does this affect entropy?

title: Comparing Mixtures and Pure Substances
text: When a mixture is separated into its pure components, what happens to the structure and arrangement of molecules? Does this indicate more or less randomness?

title: Analyzing the Entropy Change
text: Think about the level of disorder in a mixture of ethanol and water compared to pure ethanol and pure water. Does the entropy increase or decrease?
